mapper.insert: insert into tvapp_download_info (appinfo_id, perversion, version, name, wifimac, ip, mac, createtime, sn, koiccode) values ( #{appinfoid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{perversion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wifimac,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mac,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{koiccode,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
